name: Keito's BODY version3
description: I have published this pattern on my blog.
sizes_available: Doll size. Details are in the notes.
full_text: I have published this pattern on my blog. I am currently preparing to publish the PDF pattern. Features of version 3 of Keito’s body pattern. 1.The head has a pattern that makes it easy to flocking hair. 2.The knees have a simpler pattern. 3.Adjusted the length of the legs. 4.Adjusted so that the panties-hems is aligned. Keito’s BODY SIZE The body of the doll must be within the size below in order to wear Keito’s clothing. Height 36~38cm(to the toe) Bust 17~18cm Waist 13~14cm Hips 17~18cm Foot 3.5cm About me … My English is not perfect, so there may be some confusion when you knit my patterns. I post this patterns on my blog and also post additional explanations of my patterns for your reference. I hope you enjoy my patterns.
